name: components/Logged.js
navigationOptions
description: Pass the title option to the navigation

name: state
description:
visibility : The visibility of the update password button | 
password:  The user password |
canUpdatePassword: If the user can update the password or not

types: {visible: boolean, password: string, id: string, canUpdatePassword: boolean}

name: _updatePassword
description: Update the password in the SQLite DB

name: _cancel
description: Hide the modal to change the password when user click on the cancel button

name: _showModal
description: Show the modal to change the password

name: _convertToJsObject
description: Convert the item from the sign in screen to json object

name: components/ModalPassword.js

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} visible - The visibility of the update password button

name: components/SignIn.js
navigationOptions
description: Pass the title option to the navigation

name: state
description:
email: The user email |
password: The user password | 
users: Users list

name: componentDidMount
description: Call the method selectUser to get all the users of the DB

name: _selectUsers
description: Select all the users from the SQLite DB

name: _checkUser
description: Check if the informations put by the user are equivalent to a user from the SQLite DB

name: _checkTextInput
description: Check if the email and password put by the user are correct

name: components/SignUp.js
navigationOptions
description: Pass the title option to the navigation

name: state
description:
name: The user name | 
email: The user email |
password: The user password

name: _insert
description: Insert the user in the SQLite DB

name: _checkTextInput
description: Check the value in the text input

content:
{
  "main": "node_modules/expo/AppEntry.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "expo start",
    "android": "expo start --android",
    "ios": "expo start --ios",
    "web": "expo start --web",
    "eject": "expo eject"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-react-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "expo": "~36.0.0",
    "expo-sqlite": "^8.0.0",
    "react": "~16.9.0",
    "react-dom": "~16.9.0",
    "react-native": "https://github.com/expo/react-native/archive/sdk-36.0.0.tar.gz",
    "react-native-gesture-handler": "~1.5.0",
    "react-native-paper": "^3.4.0",
    "react-native-reanimated": "~1.4.0",
    "react-native-root-toast": "3.0.2",
    "react-native-screens": "2.0.0-alpha.12",
    "react-native-web": "~0.11.7",
    "react-navigation": "^4.0.10",
    "react-navigation-stack": "^1.10.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-preset-expo": "~8.0.0",
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0"
  },
  "private": true
}
name: package.json
